question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify and select companies operating in the technology industry based on their business profile.
Extract social media engagement data (likes, comments, ER) from relevant platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube) for the filtered technology companies.
Compile and aggregate the social media metrics to analyze trends in engagement over time for the technology industry companies.
Generate visual reports or dashboards to present the analyzed social media engagement trends and insights for stakeholders.
